TopicTitle: question about matching downloaded ships with their parts

Articles.Content: I'm not understanding how to successfully download and install modded rockets and their parts.  When I download a rocket and it appears in game it is missing 'parts'.  Do I have to separately download a parts pack and if so how do I know which one?

Yes, you do have to separately download a parts pack, and it is generally the responsibility of the person who posts the craft to specifically state where non-stock parts come from for the craft. (Most mods or DLC content is referred to by abbreviations, however.)
